name: Swirly Birb 🦆
description:
Swirly Birb is a cover of the classic mobile game Flappy-Bird. I have made this project to improve my skills in Unity web & mobile development. For the best experience try the epic fullscreen mode! My personal record is 13, see if you can beat it! 😎🤟

Controls: Press SPACEBAR to jump, the same goes for restarting after a loss. If you want to reset your highscore simply hold down R then press ENTER.
